source_sentence: 我作鬼神王　　已經五百歲
translation: I've been the king of ghosts and spirits for 500 years.

source_sentence: 東西常馳騁　　濟度諸群生
translation: always rushing east and west to save all living beings

source_sentence: 哀哉過去世　　曾作人中王
translation: How sad it is that in a past life you were once the king among men

source_sentence: 治化不以理　　今作鬼神王
translation: He rules and transforms without principle, yet now he's the king of ghosts and spirits.

source_sentence: 有願諸國王　　正治於國事
translation: May the kings of all countries govern their affairs correctly.

source_sentence: 莫作貪濁行　　復受鬼神身
translation: Do not commit the practice of craving, and you'll again experience the body of a ghost or spirit.

source_sentence: 毘樓博叉天王欲說一偈半。
translation: Virūpākṣa wishes to speak one and a half verses.

source_sentence: 我念過去世　　生於閻浮提
translation: I'm mindful of past lives that were born in Jambudvīpa

source_sentence: 豪富得自在　　諂曲不端直
translation: wealthy and powerful attain freedom, flattering and dishonest

source_sentence: 今雖作鬼王　　猶受鬼神苦
translation: Even though you are now a king of ghosts, you'll still experience the suffering of ghosts and spirits.

source_sentence: 毘樓勒叉天王欲說三偈。
translation: The heavenly king Virūḍhaka wanted to speak three verses.

source_sentence: 我今作鬼王　　得離三塗苦
translation: I now become the king of ghosts and attain freedom from the suffering of the three destinies

source_sentence: 涉歷四天下　　救諸病苦者
translation: to travel through the four realms under heavens to save those who suffer from illness

source_sentence: 憶念過去世　　曾作天中王
translation: remembering the past lives of those who were once kings in heaven

source_sentence: 放逸著五欲　　今受鬼王身
translation: Being addicted to the five desires, he's now subject to the body of a ghost king.

source_sentence: 又願人中王　　謹慎不放逸
translation: Also, may the king among men be disciplined and not careless

source_sentence: 度脫諸眾生　　普得涅槃樂
translation: to liberate all sentient beings and universally attain the happiness of nirvāṇa
Vaiśravaṇa wishes to speak three verses.

source_sentence: 我於往昔修菩提　　為眾生故作鬼王
translation: In the past, I cultivated enlightenment for the sake of sentient beings and became their king.

source_sentence: 眾生久處無明闇　　我以金錍開其眼
translation: Sentient beings have been in the darkness of ignorance for a long time. I open their eyes with a golden bowl

source_sentence: 慧眼既開度生死　　生死既脫昇泥洹
translation: As soon as the eye of wisdom is opened, birth and death are liberated, and birth and death are transcended, they enter nirvana.
The dragon king Nanda wanted to speak two and a half verses.

source_sentence: 我現處龍宮　　欲度諸龍眾
translation: I'm now in the dragon palace, wanting to save all the dragons.

source_sentence: 聞諸菩薩眾　　各各說妙行
translation: hear the bodhisattvas each explain their marvelous practices

source_sentence: 諸天龍神等　　咸皆側耳聽
translation: the gods, dragons, and so forth all hear it with their side-hearers

source_sentence: 天眾及龍眾　　歡喜不自勝
translation: The gods and dragons rejoice, not overpowering themselves.

source_sentence: 我及諸營從　　得脫諸龍身
translation: I and my followers will be liberated from the bodies of those dragons.

source_sentence: 婆難陀龍王今欲說一偈半。
translation: The dragon king Upananda now wants to speak one and a half verses.

source_sentence: 我處於龍宮　　猶如蠶處繭
translation: I am in the palace of the dragon, like a silk cocoon.

source_sentence: 願得智慧力　　壞此無明闇
translation: May you attain the power of wisdom and destroy this darkness of ignorance!

source_sentence: 濟拔眾厄難　　超度生死海
translation: to rescue all the hardships and difficulties, transcending the sea of birth and death
Sāgara-nāga-rāja wanted to speak two verses.

source_sentence: 我念過去世　　曾作人中王
translation: I'm mindful that in a past life, I was once the king among men

source_sentence: 慳悋於寶藏　　今受龍王身
translation: I'm stingy with the treasure-store, and now I'll accept the body of the dragon king.

source_sentence: 又願諸國王　　慈惠普拯濟
translation: May the kings of all countries be saved by their compassion

source_sentence: 治化以正法　　莫復受龍身
translation: to govern and transform with the right teaching, so that they no longer experience the body of a dragon

source_sentence: 和修吉龍王欲說二偈半。
translation: Vaiśravaṇa wishes to speak two and a half verses.

source_sentence: 我雖受龍身　　不受熱沙苦
translation: Even though I experience the body of a dragon, I won't experience the pain of heat and sand

source_sentence: 又於過去世　　曾作人中王
translation: Also, in a past life he was once the king among men.

source_sentence: 貪濁著世樂　　今受龍王身
translation: addicted to worldly pleasures, he's now subject to the body of a dragon king

source_sentence: 又願諸國王　　厭離於世樂
translation: May all the kings of the countries be disillusioned with worldly pleasures

source_sentence: 如囚厭於獄　　超出三界門
translation: Like a prisoner who is disillusioned with hell, he transcends the three realms.

source_sentence: 德叉迦龍王欲說二偈半。
translation: The dragon king Takshaka wanted to speak two and a half verses.

source_sentence: 又我於過去　　曾作人中王
translation: Furthermore, I was once the king among men in the past

source_sentence: 妻子及奴婢　　悉皆用布施
translation: your wives, children, slaves, and servants all use it as a gift

source_sentence: 坐以一瞋故　　今受龍王身
又願諸國王　　謙敬以仁義
translation: May all kings be honored with kindness and benevolence

source_sentence: 莫復自豪貴　　後受龍王身
translation: Don't be so proud that you'll later receive the body of a dragon king

source_sentence: 阿那婆達多龍王欲說四偈。
translation: Ānanda, the dragon king Anavatapta wanted to speak four verses.

source_sentence: 我念過去世　　曾於閻浮提
translation: I'm mindful of past lives, when I was in Jambudvīpa

source_sentence: 曾作國王女　　端政無等雙
translation: She was once the king’s queen, incomparably beautiful and handsome.

source_sentence: 父王甚愛重　　名曰白蓮華
translation: His father, the king of great affection, is called White Lotus

source_sentence: 嫁與隣國王　　不得適其意
translation: married to a king of a neighboring state who doesn't agree with his wishes

source_sentence: 瞋恚自害死　　經歷三塗苦
translation: self-inflicted anger that harms oneself and experiences the suffering of the three destinies

source_sentence: 今受龍王身　　又願諸女人
translation: Now that you've received the body of a dragon king, may all women also

source_sentence: 厭惡女姿態　　莫復懷妬忌
translation: disgusted by the appearance of women and no longer harbor jealousy

source_sentence: 後受毒龍苦　　難得脫苦時
translation: When the pain of poisonous dragons is later experienced, it's difficult to be freed from the pain

source_sentence: 摩那斯龍王今欲說二偈半。
translation: Now, the dragon king Manas wishes to speak two and a half verses.

source_sentence: 久處於龍宮　　厭患諸龍臭
translation: For a long time, he stayed at the dragon palace and became disillusioned with the smell of the dragons.

source_sentence: 腥臊如溷猪　　處廁不覺苦
translation: It's like a foul-smelling pig that doesn't experience pain when it's in the toilet

source_sentence: 三界諸人天　　皆亦復如是
translation: The same applies to humans and gods of the three realms.

source_sentence: 樂在三界獄　　如猪不厭廁
translation: It's pleasant to be in the three realms of hell like a pig that doesn't tire of the toilet.

source_sentence: 哀哉甚可傷　　不知求解脫
translation: How pitiable it is that you do not know how to seek liberation!

source_sentence: 漚波羅龍王今欲說五偈半。
translation: Upāla-nāga-rāja now wants to speak five and a half verses.

source_sentence: 我於過去世　　曾於閻浮提
translation: In a past life, I was once in Jambudvīpa

source_sentence: 婆羅門家子　　聰明甚黠慧
translation: a son of the brāhmaṇa family who is intelligent and very clever

source_sentence: 時有隣國王　　女來娉我妻
translation: At that time, there was a neighboring king whose wife came to marry me.

source_sentence: 此女不貞良　　私外共人通
translation: 'This woman is impure and good-natured, privately shared with others.'

source_sentence: 我時伺捕得　　斬之於都市
translation: At the time, I was hoping to catch him and kill him in the city.

source_sentence: 我時惡賊彼　　送之歸本國
translation: At that time, I'm a bad thief and they send me back to my own country.

source_sentence: 思惟欲穢惡　　出家行正道
translation: to contemplate the defilement of desire, leave home, and practice the right path

source_sentence: 復遇惡知識　　不值好同學
translation: Again, if you meet a bad friend and don't meet good fellow students

source_sentence: 引置諸婬人　　時我惋嘆恨
translation: I am saddened and distressed at the sight of those who have been driven into hell.

source_sentence: 持刀自刎死　　經歷三塗苦
translation: to carry a sword and kill yourself, enduring the three destinies of suffering

source_sentence: 從是受龍身　　甚苦不可言
translation: From this, he receives the body of a dragon that's so painful and inexpressible

source_sentence: 胡蘇低羅龍王今欲白一事。
translation: The dragon king Hu蘇低羅龍王 胡蘇低羅龍王今欲白事。

source_sentence: 我於閻浮提　　典主十六國
translation: I am the ruler of sixteen kingdoms in Jambudvīpa.

source_sentence: 餘國皆易化　　惟此國難教
translation: The other countries are easy to teach, but this country is difficult to teach.

source_sentence: 群臣皆諂偽　　貪濁多姦詭
translation: The ministers are all flattering and hypocritical, greedy and often adulterous.

source_sentence: 旱澇不均平　　莫不由此事
translation: No one fails to do so because the drought and flooding are uneven
Dhāraṇī of Miscellaneous Collected Documents, Volume 3
